sentences.sContent: Historian Michael Beschloss debunks a few myths.
sentences.sCn: 历史学家迈克尔·贝斯切罗斯揭露了一些神话的真相。

synos.tran: 揭穿；拆穿…的假面具；暴露

trans.tranOther: If you debunk a widely held belief, you show that it is false. If you debunk something that is widely admired, you show that it is not as good as people think it is.
